remarks: Deduce weak dominance from an implicit onto function (stated in a way which avoids ~ ax-rep ).  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Feb-2015.)
statement:
wdom2d.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
wdom2d.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
wdom2d.o $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> E. y e. B x = X ) $.
wdom2d $p |- ( ph -> A ~<_* B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x y $.
